import React, {useEffect, useState} from 'react' import s from './Main.module.css' import Gantt from '../Gantt/Gantt' import axios from "axios"; const Main = () => { const[task, setTask] = useState([]) useEffect(()=>{ axios .get('http://localhost:8000/api/v1/gant/tasks') .then( res => { setTask(res.data) }) }) const data = { data: [ { id: task.id, text: task.name}, ] }; return (
) } export default Main
